mapper.insert: insert into bQna (qna_num, qna_category, qna_question, qna_content, qna_nickname, qna_email, qna_filename, qna_filepath) values ((select NVL(MAX(qna_num), 0) + 1 from bQna), #{qna_category}, #{qna_question}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_nickname}, #{qna_email},#{qna_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qna_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select q.* from (select rownum qna_no, q.* from (select * from bQna order by qna_num) q order by qna_no desc) q where qna_no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
